attributes.action: Peteition for Schools to fly the British Flag and for Children to attend Christian church and sing the National Anthem at assembly
attributes.additional_details: It seems like for some reason our National Identity is being dismissed and forgotten.  We demand that our children should have to go to mass once a week.  Also to be taught that this country was built by good Chrisitans and this is a Christian country.  And that we should fly the flag at schools and sing the national anthem.
